response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled benefits, we believe its value exceeds $1,000,000. We are offering this extraordinary opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive chance to own something truly remarkable. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
